page.title: Althea
page.t: This Ship is an addition to Easy Life, it is more or less cheating. It holds tons of people for the missions, is a very good fighter, almost undestructable, kills even Ks without much of a sweat and has the looks of a absolutely beautiful ship in the game, the Kobra. Lean back and enjoy your Easy Life in X4.
This weapon is Xenon Tek, which was created on the road, during my adventures with the Yaki, which are my best friends.
This is a weapon, that was created after my adventures with the Terrans and the Yaki, when the terran secret service asked me to destabilize the argon empire.
